multiplechoiceresponse.label: Which of the following were responsible for building the first ever version of the edX platform? Click the '? Hint' button at bottom right for some fun advice. And if you choose wrong, we'll even give you feedback! (Try us...)

choicegroup.choice: Yale and Harvard Two Liberal Arts schools? As if.
Harvard and MIT Those are the ones!
Berkley and CalTech Right idea... wrong coast.
Duke and UNC-Chapel Hill Nope. We're pretty sure Duke and Carolina would never voluntarily work together.

demandhint.hint: In my mind I am NOT going to Carolina.
People like to pahk in their yahd.
None of the schools rhyme with Kale.
